name: NSMessagePortNameServer
desc: A server takes and returns message ports.

items.name: + sharedInstance
items.desc: Returns the singleton instance of NSMessagePortNameServer.

items.name: - portForName:
items.desc: Returns the NSPort object registered under a given name on the local host.

items.name: - portForName:host:
items.desc: Returns the NSPort object registered under a given name on the local host.
